item.title: My First Post
item.description: MLK SPEEECH Hey check out this speech I just found out that’s super inspirational I am happy to join with you today in what will go down in history as the greatest demonstration for freedom in the history of our nation. Five score years ago, a great American, in whose symbolic shadow we stand today, signed the Emancipation Proclamation. This momentous decree came as a great beacon of hope to millions of Negro slaves, who had been seared in the flames of withering injustice.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey fam üçç, I’m a student in CS and I love drinking a cold one on the weekend with the homies. I like to program in C++, Python. Seriously though, look at my C++ code below. #include <iostream> int main() { std::cout << "Hello fam" << std::endl; return 0; } Thanks again, for coming to my site!
